root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 17-15-1, translated into en
root.data: Goal 17. Strengthen the means of implementing and revitalizing the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development17.15 Respect the room for maneuver and the authority of each country in the formulation and implementation of policies for poverty eradication and sustainable development17.15.1 Extent of reliance by development co-operation providers on country-specific results frameworks and planning toolsNot definedNot defined
